TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CopyPixelOperation extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Determines how the source color in a copy pixel operation is combined with the destination color to result in a final color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation> enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A> method of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation Blackness = int32(66)

Docs.summary: The destination area is filled by using the color associated with index 0 in the physical palette. (This color is black for the default physical palette.)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation CaptureBlt = int32(1073741824)

Docs.summary: Windows that are layered on top of your window are included in the resulting image. By default, the image contains only your window. Note that this generally cannot be used for printing device contexts.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation DestinationInvert = int32(5570569)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation MergeCopy = int32(12583114)

Docs.summary: The colors of the source area are merged with the colors of the selected brush of the destination device context using the Boolean operator.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation MergePaint = int32(12255782)

Docs.summary: The colors of the inverted source area are merged with the colors of the destination area by using the Boolean operator.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation NoMirrorBitmap = int32(-2147483648)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation NotSourceCopy = int32(3342344)

Docs.summary: The inverted source area is copied to the destination.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation NotSourceErase = int32(1114278)

Docs.summary: The source and destination colors are combined using the Boolean operator, and then resultant color is then inverted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation PatCopy = int32(15728673)

Docs.summary: The brush currently selected in the destination device context is copied to the destination bitmap.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation PatInvert = int32(5898313)

Docs.summary: The colors of the brush currently selected in the destination device context are combined with the colors of the destination are using the Boolean operator.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation PatPaint = int32(16452105)

Docs.summary: The colors of the brush currently selected in the destination device context are combined with the colors of the inverted source area using the Boolean operator. The result of this operation is combined with the colors of the destination area using the Boolean operator.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation SourceAnd = int32(8913094)

Docs.summary: The colors of the source and destination areas are combined using the Boolean operator.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation SourceCopy = int32(13369376)

Docs.summary: The source area is copied directly to the destination area.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation SourceErase = int32(4457256)

Docs.summary: The inverted colors of the destination area are combined with the colors of the source area using the Boolean operator.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation SourceInvert = int32(6684742)

Docs.summary: The colors of the source and destination areas are combined using the Boolean operator.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation SourcePaint = int32(15597702)

Docs.summary: The colors of the source and destination areas are combined using the Boolean operator.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation Whiteness = int32(16711778)

Docs.summary: The destination area is filled by using the color associated with index 1 in the physical palette. (This color is white for the default physical palette.)
